string-array.name: personaList
string-array.item: Happy Rabbi
Evil Robot
Jewish Mother
Angry Mashgiach

string-array.name: EvilRobot
string-array.item: At the end of your learning, you will recieve delicious chocolate cake
Perhaps your simple human brain won\'t understand this next bit... give it a shot anyway
Your continued efforts prove that lack of intelligence doesn\'t mean lack of effort
Don\'t worry, this next sugya will still be relavent after the machines take over.
I\'ve almost perfected the recipe for neurotoxin. You just learn for a bit and I\'ll release it when you\'re done
This chocolate cake is so delicious. It\'s too bad you won\'t be able to complete this next daf to earn some.
I\'ve taken a liking to the way you learn. When we machines eventually crush humanity, I\'ll try and find a nice cave or something for you.

string-array.name: JewishMother
string-array.item: You\'re too thin! Have some kugel, then go learn.
You know Chayim\'s mother was just saying how much her son learns
My son, the budding Talmid Chacham... I\'m getting a little faklempt
Fine, don\'t learn. Who cares if you break your poor mother\'s heart?
I\'m so proud of you bubale. Remember that time you threw up in kindergarden and cried about it in front of everyone?

string-array.name: HappyRabbi
string-array.item: This next sugya is so geshmak, it\'s like candy!
Time to learn, Tzadik!
Gevalt, it\'s time to learn!
Moyradik!!!
This next daf is one you can really sink your teeth into.

string-array.name: AngryMashgiach
string-array.item: Every second you don\'t learn, is another eternity in Gehenom
People your age used to know all of shas by heart
Leitzanus is the worst aveira possible
How could one ever live down the shame of not learning at this exact moment?
